Due due to the extra breaks she's been given at school and discounts on meals at the cafeteria, she's been starting to gain a bit. Not to far back, but she's been looking like she's two months pregnant. Spike's been noticing, but never pointed it out.

One Day as Twilight was writing an essay, she heard the bell go off for her next break. Twilight decided to...

1421.content:
It didn't start out as a particularly welcome morning for Rainbow Dash. She fluttered her eyes open only to find herself not in her bed or even in her house. Instead, she was tied to a chair in her pajamas as she struggled.

"What the heck is going on? Is this some sort of ransom thing? Probably from a rival school." Rainbow said before a figure was walking into the room. They were dressed in a black robe with a menacing mask. Rainbow was scared until Pinkie Pie stepped out.

"Oh, hey Dashie! You like my costume for Halloween next year? Pretty scary right?" Pinkie asked.

"Pinkie, what's going on? Why am I tied to a chair in my PJ's?" Rainbow asked.

"Oh, easy. I sort of kidnapped you." Pinkie said. "Only because...
1421.title: Kidnapped By Her Best Friend

1511.content: What kind of fashion reasons.
1511.title: Fashion reasons

15112.content:
"I'll take a triple deluxe burger with a side of fries and a large cola." Rarity said at the counter as she was getting lunch with Sunset, who went with a small salad. As they took their food to a table, Sunset noticed that Rarity was getting a bit of a belly that made her shirt ride up.

"Uh...Rarity? You sure have been hitting the fast food pretty hard lately, haven't you?" Sunset said nervously.

"Yes. I see you've noticed." Rarity said with a chuckle patting her tummy.

"Have you ever considered going on a diet? Cause keep this up and you'll outgrow your entire wardrobe." Sunset said.

"I am well aware Sunset and I will not go on a diet until I start my new trend!" Rarity said.

"New trend? You're doing this on purpose?!" Sunset said in surprise.

"Indeed." Rarity said scarfing down a bite of burger. "You see, I've noticed a lot of the figure challenged have problems coordinating clothes and fashion. Well, I am going to make a statement for them! Bigger...is...BETTER!" she said.

"While I'm proud about you standing up for certain people but shouldn't you be more concerned with...."
15112.title: Bigger is Better

choices: Red Pill aka the Hunger Pill
Yellow Pill aka Weight Doubling Pill
151122.content:
"Image? Ha. Let me tell you darlings. Image is nothing but a state of mind. Besides, I've seen how big people are teased sometimes and I need to try and make a stand." Rarity said standing on the table before hearing a rip.

"Uh...before trying to make a stand...consider making sure your clothes can stand the new you." Sunset said as the white skinned girl blushed.

"Um...yes. Quite. Anyway...nothing a little sewing and letting out my clothes can accomplish." Rarity said.

"Well, its not my place to argue but...there maybe something that can help." Sunset said.

"Really? You'd help me on my quest?" Rarity asked in excitement.

"Of course. You're my friend after all and friends help each other out. Look, I'm not going to lie...I may have been like you at some point." Sunset said sliding a photo to Rarity showing herself except she was twice as large as how she currently was.

"My stars! Your clothes could barely fit. But wait...how did you gain, let alone lose, all of that weight so easily?" Rarity asked.

Sunset smiled as she dug through her bag and took out a bottle of pills. "These were made from someone I knew in Equestria. Each colored pill has a different effect. I'll let you try one." she said as she handed Rarity a pill.
151122.title: Image Problem? No

choices: Rarity has her sights set on making herself a Plus Sized Model/designer
Rarity secretly wants the rest of her friends to share in her new desires
1511222.content:
Rarity was handed a strange yellow pill. "So...I just swallow it?" Rarity asked.

"Yeah. Don't worry. Its not dangerous or anything." Sunset said reassuring her friend.

"Well...all right." Rarity said as she swallowed the pill without a second thought. It was after that she heard a rumbling in her belly as her body seemed to plump up before her eyes, making her clothes feel tighter, her face a little chubbier and her thighs thicker. "What the? What happened?"

"The yellow pills are weight doubling pills. They multiply your weight by twice of how you original weighed. You were about 130....now you're 260." Sunset said. "See, these pills have some magic with them that influence weight. Red makes you incredibly hungry. Orange is something special called the Sumo pill. Blue makes your body absorb water, turning it into fat. Green lets you turn inanimate objects into fattening foods. Purple influences your personality to want to be fat. And white, that one resets you to before ingesting your first pill."

"Wow...this is amazing. Sunset, I cannot thank you enough." Rarity said taking the bottle.

"No prob. Just don't go too overboard with it." Sunset said as Rarity hurried out.
1511222.title: Double Up

info.brief_description: Take a character or two from Equestria Girls and let them pack on the pounds.
info.description:
Gift points will be rewarded for every addition.

Well this is the first story I've created on this site. Hopefully it doesn't end up in a disaster.
For those who like Equestria Girls (or MLP in general,) this might be of your interest.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------To whoever it may concern. Feel free to add on chapters to this. However, like a lot of stories here. There are rules.

1. You're free to add characters that haven't been included yet, even in they weren't in Equestria Girls (ie: Zecora or Queen Chrysalis.) (If you wish to include oc's to the story, message me and we'll discuss it.)

2. Characters can be fed into fattening, just don't go to far into it, (ie: making the feedee end up the size of a house or filling up an entire room) The most anyone can gain in one stiing is 100 pound. After that, give them some time to gain another 100.
2. Also, eating shouldn't be the only thing that happens in this story. Be sure to include other things, (ie: the advantages/disadvantages of a character's new body.)

4. Sex is shyed upon but acceptable. Just don't go too far into detail with it.

5. What's allowed:
Fattening
Wardrobe Malfunctions
Immobility *To specify, immobility is fine. However, I have standards in terms of size. So no 'making the girls bloat up to ridiculous sizes' please. The most I'll go with is the 'take up half the bedroom' size.
Gaining with magic, pills, potions/drinks.

6. What's not allowed:
Vore
Scat
Pregnancy
Death (including bursting)

(10/12/15 Edit)
7. When adding a chapter, make sure it holds some effort, and when ending it off with choices, make sure the choices can lead down different paths.
Good Example: "Who did *Character A* meet up with in the hallway?"
Bad example: "What was *Character A* going to have for lunch?"
(If you want to bring up what they're going to eat, include it in the chapter your chapter and don't make someone choose it for you, unless in absolutely necessary.)

(7/09/17 Edit)
From here on out, I'm offering some of my points to future adders to this story, (unless this story's been completely left in the dust,) The amount of points I'll give depends on the length of the chapter written.

If I feel like I need to include more rules in the future, I will.
Aside from that, Can't wait to see how this turns out, go right ahead and add. Have fun :)
